ai.prompt:
Transform this photo into an Asian-style horror ghost photo:
1. Add glowing red demon eyes ONLY to the teddy bear - do NOT add red eyes to people or other objects
2. Add faint, translucent Korean/Japanese style vengeful spirits (wonhon/yurei) in the dark background - long black hair, white clothing, blurry and ghostly appearance
3. The ghost figures can be very faint and hazy, barely visible
4. DO NOT modify the original people - keep their faces, clothes, and poses exactly the same
5. Create an eerie East Asian horror movie atmosphere
